_comment_type: Question Type: Summary Completion Selecting From List
_comment_description: Students complete a summary by selecting appropriate words from a provided word bank/list.
_comment_use_case: Reading Passage 2/3, summary completion with limited word choices
prompt:
Complete the summary below. Choose your answers from the box below the summary.

Climate change affects many aspects of life. Rising temperatures cause _____ to melt, leading to higher sea levels. This threatens coastal _____. Meanwhile, changing weather patterns affect _____ production worldwide.

Word Bank:
A. glaciers  B. communities  C. agriculture  D. forests  E. mountains  F. industries

_field_descriptions.prompt: Summary with blanks and word bank below
_field_descriptions.answer_key: Word from the list that fills the blank (can be letter or word)
_field_descriptions.word_list: Array of available words to choose from

_validation_rules.answer_key: Must match one item from word_list (letter or word)
_validation_rules.word_list: Array of strings, typically 6-10 words for 3-6 blanks
_validation_rules.word_usage: Each word typically used only once across all blanks

_word_bank_guidelines.word_types: Mix of nouns, verbs, adjectives relevant to passage topic
_word_bank_guidelines.difficulty: Some obvious fits, some requiring careful consideration
_word_bank_guidelines.distractors: Plausible but incorrect words from passage topic
